casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brian VANN. No. 115P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. LaToya B. Powell, Associate Attorney General, Edward w. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
